key_risks: Environmental impact due to resource extraction and emissions
Regulatory and legal risks from varying international regulations
Supply chain vulnerabilities from raw material and energy price volatility
Economic sensitivity tied to the cyclical construction industry
controversies: Fined €160,000 by the Austrian Financial Market Authority for delayed publication of a participation report
environmental_issues: Resource extraction and energy consumption leading to environmental scrutiny
Reliance on clay and shale extraction despite sustainability initiatives
social_issues: Enforcement of labor and employment standards across the supply chain
governance_issues: Governance and compliance vulnerabilities highlighted by the FMA fine

sources.title: Cartel Court subjects merger of Wienerberger and Terreal to conditions ...
sources.snippet: On 20 December 2022, the Austrian Federal Competition Authority (AFCA) received notification of the merger of Wienerberger AG with Terreal Holding S.A.S. After the deadline for the review was extended from 4 to 6 weeks, the AFCA applied to the Cartel Court for an in-depth review. On 13 June 2023, the Cartel Court approved the merger subject to conditions. The decision is final.
